results.title: Red Cliff
results.Synopsis: The first chapter of a two-part story centered on a battle fought in China's Three Kingdoms period (220-280 A.D.).

results.title: Tag
results.Synopsis: A small group of former classmates organize an elaborate, annual game of tag that requires some to travel all over the country.

results.title: Ender's Game
results.Synopsis: Young Ender Wiggin is recruited by the International Military to lead the fight against the Formics, an insectoid alien race who had previously tried to invade Earth and had inflicted heavy losses on humankind.

results.title: Maze Runner: The Death Cure
results.Synopsis: Young hero Thomas embarks on a mission to find a cure for a deadly disease known as The Flare.

results.title: Deadpool 2
results.Synopsis: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (AKA. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg, Cable.

results.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
results.Synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

results.title: Doctor Strange
results.Synopsis: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

results.title: Venom
results.Synopsis: A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.

results.title: The Notebook
results.Synopsis: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.

results.title: The Hangover
results.Synopsis: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

results.title: Braveheart
results.Synopsis: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

results.title: The Last Samurai
results.Synopsis: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.
King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

results.title: Troy
results.Synopsis: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.

results.title: World War Z
results.Synopsis: Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane traverses the world in a race against time to stop the Zombie pandemic that is toppling armies and governments, and threatening to destroy humanity itself.

results.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
results.Synopsis: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

results.title: Robin Hood
results.Synopsis: In 12th century England, Robin and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.

results.title: 3:10 to Yuma
results.Synopsis: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

results.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
results.Synopsis: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.

results.title: Kingdom of Heaven
results.Synopsis: Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.

results.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
results.Synopsis: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous friend, escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.
